Explanations about Options.-d:
Always create a containing directory for the contents of the unpacked archive. By
 default, a directory is created if there is more than one top-level file or folder.

Top-3 Scripts:
ul_321683: for d in *.zip
do
  dir=/home/usrname/anotherdir/zip${d%%.zip}
  unzip -d "$dir" "$d"
done

ul_586576: for file in *.zip; do
    [ -f "$file" ] || continue
    unzip "$file" -d "${file%%.zip}"
done
